p: The chemical biosynthesis of TQ as a member of monoterpene compounds initiates in most species by cyclization of geranyl diphosphate and formation of Î³-terpinene, that afterwards is aromatized into p-cymene and hydroxylated to carvacrol. Further hydroxylation of carvacrol occurs and allows the formation of thymohydroquinone. Thymohydroquinone then starts an oxidation process that finally leads to TQ formation [ 56].
